name: MAFRA Slovakia, a.s.
goal: MAFRA Slovakia, a.s. is multimedia company in Slovakia offering digital and print media. MAFRA Slovakia, a.s. publishes for instance Hospodárske noviny, Stratégie, Téma, Horeca and Evita magazine and operates the web portal hnonline.sk.
interests: Culture and media, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives:
Freedom of the press
Commercial communications
Copyright and related rights
Media pluralism
Data protection
